transcript: No, we won't. Oggie, it's like waiting for Santa Claus to come. I feel like I'm gonna spend my entire life standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasp expectantly in front of me waiting for the fish to show up and the fish will not show up.

segments.text: Oggie, it's like waiting for Santa Claus to come.
I feel like I'm gonna spend my entire life standing on the beach with my eyes wide open
and my hands clasp expectantly in front of me waiting for the fish to show up
and the fish will not show up.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: No, we won't.  Augie it's like waiting for Santa Claus to come.  I feel like I am going to spend my entire life standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasp expectantly in front of me waiting for the fish to show up and the fish will not show up.
